author: Nintendo of America
description:
Master Spinjitzu now in LEGO Fortnite Odyssey on Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/fortnite-plus-lego-fortnite-odyssey-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1064-01&utm_id=P1064-01

Go all out in Odyssey's Ninjago update! Command ELEMENTAL powers, new weapons and movement abilities, and your best Ninja outfit to defend Ninjago from a monstrous threat. Add some Ninja flair to your world with new Builds, Decor Bundles, and more! 

#NintendoSwitch2 #NintendoSwitch #LEGOFortniteOdyssey #Ninjago #LEGO #LEGOFortnite 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

title: LEGO Fortnite Odyssey – Ninjago: Rise of the Ninja – Nintendo Switch 2

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Follow Moka on his journey back home in Stars In The Trash, out now on Nintendo Switch: http://nintendo.com/us/store/products/stars-in-the-trash-switch/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1021-01&utm_id=P1021-01

Every cat dreams of freedom. As a spoiled cat, Moka longs for adventure and escapes his home, only to find an unexpected world. Now, appreciative of what he had, he must learn how to survive to make his way back home before he loses everything. Witness a journey full of danger, friendship, and hope, brought to life with hand-drawn animation. 

#NintendoSwitch #StarsInTheTrash 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

title: Stars In The Trash – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch
